meanings.definition: Spacious and convenient; roomy and comfortable.
meanings.sent1: The commodious living room had plenty of space for all our guests.
meanings.sent2: The new house was so commodious that we could easily fit all our furniture.
meanings.sent3: The commodious closet was like a treasure trove of hidden clothes.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a commodious place, filled with endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The commodious bed felt like a cloud, embracing me in its softness.

meanings.definition: Suitable for a particular purpose; convenient.
meanings.sent1: The commodious backpack had compartments for all my school supplies.
meanings.sent2: The commodious study area was perfect for focusing on my homework.
meanings.sent3: Carrying the commodious umbrella made me feel like Mary Poppins.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a commodious welcome, making everyone feel at ease.
meanings.sent5: The commodious toolbox held all the necessary tools for the job.
